item.title: CVE-2024-35169|2024-06-04T17:34:37.075Z -- areoi -- all%20bootstrap%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in AREOI All Bootstrap Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects All Bootstrap Blocks: from n/a through 1.3.15.
